fields.name: Warning:
fields.value:
Do not touch. May not be a golem.
Attack: Varies
Defense: Varies

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Perform the factional ability of the faction you are a part of.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You have the abilities and attributes of a random golem.
> You are part of a random faction. The faction must be evil. You are able to talk in the private chat and you know the members and they know you.
> This role can spawn in REF slots.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: > Complete the goal of your faction.
